get.summary: Retrieves the product details for the given blueprint of Mortgage product
get.description: Retrieves the product details of the given Mortgage product

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

post.summary: Creates the blueprint of Mortgage product with the provided details
post.description: Creates a blueprint of Mortgage product

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

code.description: The code related to override message.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

displayNames.description: The name used for display purposes

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

organizations.description: Indicates the product availability for organization

organizationLevel.description: Indicates the level of the organization

organizationCode.description: Indicates the organization code within the associated Level

organizationExclude.description: Indicates whether the organisation is excluded.By default,it will be included

lineOfBusiness.description: Contains the line of business in which the activity was performed. If pricing is not determined based on line of business, then this is not significant

lineOfBusinessExclude.description: Indicates whether the organisation is excluded.By default,it will be included

channels.description: Indicates the channel in which the activity was performed. If pricing is not determined based on channel, then this is not significant

channel.description: Indicates the channel in which the activity was performed. If pricing is not determined based on channel, then this is not significant

channelExclude.description: Indicates whether the channel is excluded.By default, it will be included

fixedRate.description: A fixed rate is directly entered by the user specifying the Defined Property and is not defined by an index table.Three basic types of interest are supported by T24; Fixed, Floating, and Periodic.

schedulepaymentFrequency.description: The frequency of the payment schedule

scheduleStartDate.description: Indicates the start date of the schedule

scheduleEndDate.description: Indicates the end date of the schedule

product.description: Indicates an id or name of a product

availableFromDate.description: The date when the product is available for creating arrangements

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as a credit facility or limit is due to expire

effectiveDate.description: Contains the identifier for the transaction date. Dates are expected in ‘YYYYMMDD’ format

currency.description: Identifies the currency. E.g. USD, GBP etc

variation.description: Additional product specification based on particular criteria for example the account was opened on-line and attracted a higher interest rate. Drop down list to select appropriate variation or applied automatically

commitmentTerm.description: Indicates the term of the commitment

commitmentCancelPeriod.description: Indicates the period after which if full committed deposit amount is not paid by the customer, then system shall trigger cancellation of deposits. For lending , cancel arrangement activity will be triggered if the loan amount is not disbursed fully

commitmentCoolingPeriod.description: Indicates the number of days to be considered for closure of account after renewal or rollover date for the commitment

minCommitmentTerm.description: Indicates the maximum term to which commitment is capped

maxCommitmentTerm.description: Indicates the minimum term to which commitment is capped

newarrfeeFixedAmount.description: Indicates the monetary amount that is fixed for the new arrangement creation

payofffeeFixedAmount.description: Indicates the monetary amount that is fixed for the payoff

renewalChangeDateType.description: Determines whether the product change should happen within the given period or on reaching maturity of the arrangement

renewalChangePeriod.description: Denotes the period after which the user can change the arrangement from one product to another

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

displayNames.description: The name used for display purposes

displayName.description: The name used for display purposes

organizationLevel.description: Indicates the level of the organization

organizationCode.description: Indicates the organization code within the associated Level

debitInterestFixedRate.description: Indicates the fixed rate for the debit interest

schedulepaymentFrequency.description: The frequency of the payment schedule

periodicchargeCurrency.description: Indicates the currency for the periodic charge

periodicchargeMaxChgAmount.description: Indicates the maximum charge amount that can be specified for the associated currency attribute

periodicchargeMinChgAmount.description: Indicates the minimum charge amount that can be specified for the associated currency attribute

chequewdFixedAmount.description: Indicates the monetary amount that is fixed for cheque withdrawal

highestdebitFixedAmount.description: Indicates the monetary amount that is fixed for the highest debit

balanceAvailabilityCreditCheck.description: Identifies on which balance, overdraft and limit checking should be made

balanceAvailabilityAvailBalanceUpdate.description: Identifies the options available for building the available balance on an account

balanceAvailabilityOverdraftProcessing.description: Indicates if the account supports NSF processing or not

cardissuefeeFixedAmount.description: Indicates the monetary amount that is fixed for  visa card issuing

limitfeesFixedAmount.description: Indicates the monetary amount that is fixed for limit utilization

payfeesFixedAmount.description: Indicates the monetary amount that is fixed for overdraft transaction

returnfeesFixedAmount.description: Indicates the monetary amount that is fixed  for rejecting unauthorized overdraft transactionsthe payoff

nsfreversalfeeFixedAmount.description: Indicates the monetary amount that is fixed for the reversal credit of a NSF charge

commitmentAmount.description: Indicates the total amount which will be lent or deposited for the term

commitmentTerm.description: Indicates the term of the commitment

commitmentTermTolDays.description: Denotes the tolerance value in days to indicate that term will be recalculated only if adjustment in maturity date is greater than the tolerance days speficied

commitmentCancelPeriod.description: Indicates the period after which if full committed deposit amount is not paid by the customer, then system shall trigger cancellation of deposits. For lending , cancel arrangement activity will be triggered if the loan amount is not disbursed fully

commitmentCoolingPeriod.description: Indicates the number of days to be considered for closure of account after renewal or rollover date for the commitment

maxCommitmentTerm.description: Indicates the minimum term to which commitment is capped

redemptionfeeFixedAmount.description: Indicates the fixed amount charged for the ealry redemption

renewalChangeDateType.description: Determines whether the product change should happen within the given period or on reaching maturity of the arrangement

renewalChangePeriod.description: Denotes the period after which the user can change the arrangement from one product to another

commitmentCoolingPeriod.description: Indicates the number of days to be considered for closure of account after renewal or rollover date for the commitment

maxCommitmentTerm.description: Indicates the minimum term to which commitment is capped

redemptionfeeFixedAmount.description: Indicates the fixed amount charged for the ealry redemption

renewalChangeDateType.description: Determines whether the product change should happen within the given period or on reaching maturity of the arrangement

renewalChangePeriod.description: Denotes the period after which the user can change the arrangement from one product to another
